Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: Authentic flavor and good portions. We ordered multiple items - lamb chops, summer rolls, chicken satay / skewers as appetizers. All of them were delicious and were reasonably priced. Entrees included Thai lemon curry chicken, beef pho and ‚Ä¶

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: I had a lovely dinner here. The taste is quite delicious. The service is also very very good.

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text:
The lunch menu is of great value vs cost. It was tasty and the portion was big. Recommended if you feel like having Vietnamese food.
Update: Lowering the score given that my partner and I had stomach issues the next day. Kitchen needs to be clean up or use fresh products.

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: Ate twice in one week, the pho is amazing and very fair priced. Their homemade Iced tea is also very nice.

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: Tasty as usual,but not really satisfy with the cleaning condition.Nobody would like to eat around so many flies.

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: Their lunch sets are so affordable and good! I got the curry and fresh shrimp spring roll and my friend got pho plus fried chicken spring roll. We both enjoyed our food. Service is also good so I highly recommend!

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: The lunch menu wss delicious.  I love soups so the starter and soup was just perfect. The beef soup was rich and I could not finish the helping. The dessert I chose: ice-cream was disappointing. Staff friendly and helpful. Recommended

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: Nice place and Friendly staff

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text:
Really good Vietnamese restaurant. We always come here for the pho. We've tried plenty of their side dishes also. And they all tasted amazing.
They also have lunch menu. Consisting out of medium size pho and bread with meat ‚Ä¶

Name: Saigon Caphe

food is price-quality ok.

Review Text:

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text:
Always nice to have hot soup in cold wintertime.

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: As a frequent Vietnamese restaurant visitor I can say that this is one of the better Vietnamese places in Holland. They do lunch menu's, serve pretty quick, most of the time friendly and has a nice vibe there. ‚Ä¶

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: affordable vietnamese dishes. Adjusted to dutch tastes. Consistency can be improved.

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text:
Affordable, authentic Vietnamese food!

This place had a very good quality, fresh phos and rolls! Broth tasted delicious ‚Ä¶

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: I have take away a pho soup with raw beef. Everything was well packaged. Soup was delicious! Raw beef was good but fat (a lot of  gristle on it) but everything was perfect! I recommend this place !

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: The service is prompt and good. They have a good selection of Vietnamese dishes. I tried the spicy beef and pork noodle soup. The taste is westernized and not to spicy but still a good choice in Amsterdam.

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: Decent food with great service. When there with my colleagues and had their lunch set menu which is highly recommended. Had their beef pho and Vietnamese bun set with a glass of hot lemongrass with honey which were extremely satisfying on a cold cloudy late afternoon!

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: One of my favorite place to eat Vietnamese whether it is lunch or diner. It is very affordable and the staff is super kind! (Every time we went, there were enough parking spots)

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: I love this place. I've been going here for a few years. Their Vietnamese fresh spring rolls were amazing as always.

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: Lunch menu is of great value! I recommend you to try Bahn Mi

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: Decent prices, but the fried noodles were too fatty. But for Vietnamese food I like Hanoi Old Quarter, in the centre of Amsterdam, much better.

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: Very nice place with tasty food and great staff. We had to wait a little longer, and the beer wasn't included into the receipt:)

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: Lunch special is really a good deal. You can choose a main and a side which costs you less than 10euro. I didn't expect the portion of the side bahn mi is that big. Very nice lunch with attentive staff.

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: Amazingly friendly service! Good food with very good lunch deals. Definitely coming back here.

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: Very good restaurant, the lunch deals are a great way to eat delicious food for an affordable price. Their pho is super tasty and you can adjust it yourself (just be careful with the spicy peppers ;)). I loved the pho with beef and shrimp. Highly recommended!

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: The best restaurant of Amstelveen. Great original vietnamese food. Excellent service and fair price!!!

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: After trying this place for the third time and each time I have tried a different menu I can say that the summer rolls are nice and the lunch menu is a good deal. But I can only give three stars because the food is missing the "right" ‚Ä¶

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: Friendly and fast Service. Portion size okay and both meals been tasty a nice balance in flavors, meat quality was also good.

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: Food was very good and the price is very reasonable

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: Just love this place, their Thit Kho is my fave. Spring rolls are also good, fresh and well balanced, without too much vermicelli like it's often the case

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: My family and I are usual customers here, at least once a month since it opened. Food is tasty and served quickly, especially Pho noodle soup. Quality has always been consistent. Staffs are helpful and friendly. Easily a 5-star from me.

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: Decent Vietnamese food üòä service is good but missing nice ambiance.

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: I changed my review from a 5 star to a 2 star. On sunday 19th of July I came to eat in at your lovely restaurant, only to be greeted by grumpy faces. I was very diassapointed to have been treated like this. The overall mood was not great. ‚Ä¶

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: After the last menu revision, it starts to be an interesting restaurant. The lunch special is good value for money and many of the other dishes have improved too. They do bring some authentic Vietnamese elements on the table, albeit that ‚Ä¶

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: I absolutely love this place! I‚Äôve eaten her so many times and it never bores. Although I‚Äôm not an expert on this field, I think the pho and the salad bowls are great, and the spring rolls, salad rolls and sandwiches are delicious. ‚Ä¶

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: I love their pho soup. Keep on coming back

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: Incredibly fast service and very tasty food.

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: Our family‚Äôs favorite restaurant. Tasty Vietnamese food (trust me, I‚Äôm Vietnamese myself),our favorite dishes are the lamp chop, bun bo hue, banh xeo, lemongrass iced tea, and of course all of the desserts ;), friendly & fast service. Easy ‚Ä¶

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: Been there 3 times. Taste is normal, not a bad restaurant. But I stopped going here after I found a long hair inside the pho noodle soup. Moreover, servers don't seem to take it seriously.

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: Wow, incredible dedication! Ordering from Uber Eats we got a Pho without the broth (only the protein & vegetables). After getting nowhere with the Uber Eats help desk, I called the restaurant and they personally send someone out of the ‚Ä¶

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: The salade Rolls are a must. A nutritional treat for your tastebuds. The Hu Tiu rice noodle soup was a true noodle soup connoisseur dream. With the herbs,veggies and chilis on the side I was able to give it the personal finishing touch it ‚Ä¶

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: Nice outside, Quick service and the staff Is very kind

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: Great variety of vietnamese dishes here and pretty fast service.  The noodle bowls are very big so come hungry.  Management is chinese,  but still very good vietnamese taste.  Try the Bun BO.  There is a parking lot just in front so very convenient to visit.

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: We asked for a crab and pork soup, the soup came without crab and no explanation until we asked. The prawn chicken pancake was super dried and other dish with a sweet sour sauce just remind me of commertial ketchup. Spring rolls driping oil... An experience that we dont want to repeat.

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: Amazing raw beef soup, just amazing... Oh and you should try the ice tea! 4/5 because the atmosphere is not really special. I wouldn't bring my date here. Go for the food!

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: ordered / picked up the Pho and soup with tripe a few times, great addition to the selection of asian food in Buietvelderd / Amstelveen. Also the salad rolls are fresh and crunchy. No complaints what soever, but i didn't sit down here yet.

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: This place gets very busy for both lunch amd dinner, so drop in off peak or make a reservation. Food comes out quickly (starters only took 5 mins), and the overall flavor was good. A solid option if you're visiting the Gelderlandplein.

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: Used to be the 'five star' pho house, but then after seeing a hair in the soup...It's now the 'three star'. Overall taste is awesome though.

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: Excellent Pho, egg rolls and salad rolls, authentic and fresh. Nice terrace outside for warmer days. Please try the strawberry ice tea!

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text:
Worst experience I have ever had!
We just arrived at Amsterdam, tired and with luggage. After we sit down we are asked to remove ourselves to the seats on the other side. I asked why because ‚Ä¶

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: Wow the fastest and fullest food experience of 2021 for me

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: The food does not have a normal flavor. I think it's because of the spices that are in it. Even a simple chicken takes a sweet to cook. I'm sorry for my choice.

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: Second time here, first time was not super, but wanted to give it another try. Tasteless pho, broth was like water. Service was so so, they don't seem to understand how to keep clients happy. Wil never visit this place again.

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: It grew a lot over the years, not anymore only a limited menu but quite an extensive menu with good quality food. Always busy inside and outside. Great location, easy to park underground.

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: Delicious caramel duck breast with rice and season vegetables ..... yummie

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: A male staff is really disrespectful. Something went wrong with my card and another female staff who was really kind to help me. But he just stood there impatiently and asked me whether I calmed down. So rude. One star for the nice female staff. Not recommend here

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: Pho had no vegetables or flavor, meat was highly processed and tasteless, and on top of it all they got our order wrong. Delivery took almost 2 hours.

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: An enjoyable lunch and a fairly comfortable sitting structure. Strongly recommend if looking for a Thai cuisine restaurant

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: Delicious food, friendly staff

Name: Saigon Caphe
Review Text: Surprisingly good Vietnamese food in a train station. Super friendly service. A most welcomed stop arriving in Amsterdam and a most needed stop leaving Amsterdam.

Name: Saigon Caphe
